headline: Targa Resources price target raised to $262 from $200 at Citi
summary: Citi analyst Spiro Dounis raised the firm’s price target on Targa Resources (TRGP) to $262 from $200 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm applies a higher multiple to reflect accelerated growth in 2027 and later after the company pointed to $4.5B of 2026 growth capex, which Citi says is over $1B higher than expected.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and ana
